attributes.action: We don’t want war. don’t involve us in the US and Russian war if there is one!
attributes.additional_details: In the more likely situation where Russia declares war (although it may not be through an official declaration), the majority if not all of NATO would come to the support of the United States. Russia knows this. This is where the scenario escalates to nuclear war/World War III. The United Kingdom, one of the strongest allies of the United States, would most certainly support in this scenario. It is, however, possible they may not participat
attributes.background:
The United Kingdom, one of the strongest allies of the United States, would most certainly support in this scenario. 
I think the people of the U.K. should have the choice if they want this not just down to allies

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a clear and specific action. 

We're not sure whether you'd like the UK to commit to never going to war with Russia or whether you'd like something else. We're also not sure how you would like the people of the UK to be given a choice. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
